amendment.description: At the end of the bill, insert after the last section (preceding the short title) the following new section: \ SEC. 742. None of the funds appropriated by this Act may be used to assist in overturning the judicial ruling contained in the Memorandum and Order of the United States District Court for the Southern District of Illinois entered on July 31, 2003, in the action entitled Kathi Cooper, Beth Harrington, and Matthew Hillesheim, Individually and on Behalf of All Those Similarly Situated vs. IBM Personal Pension Plan and IBM Corporation (Civil No. 99- 829-GPM).
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds from being used to assist in overturning the judicial ruling contained in the Memorandum and Order of the United States District Court for the Southern District of Illinois entered on July 31, 2003, in the action entitled Kathi Cooper, Beth Harrington, and Matthew Hillesheim, Individually and on Behalf of All Those Similarly Situated vs. IBM Personal Pension Plan and IBM Corporation.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Sanders amendment (A025) Agreed to by recorded vote: 258 - 160 (Roll no. 485).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A025) offered by Mr. Sanders.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Sanders amendment (A025) Agreed to by recorded vote: 258 - 160 (Roll no. 485).
